typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	httpMethod: 'GET',
	timeout: 30,
	requestInterval: 0) ~> VismaExtraTest
VismaExtraTest alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ID as integer,
		ItemSKU as string,
		Cost as string,
		BarCodePrincipal as string,
		BarCodeSecondary as string,
		BarCodePrin_Update as string,
		BarCodeSec_Update as string,
		Supplier as string,
		Updated as string,
		ItemInStock as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['ItemSKU'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ItemSKU,
		ItemInStock = IteminStock
	)) ~> sinkExtraTest
